ISSUE.TITLE: Two alerts displayed in admin settings to reload the current tenant
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The `/Admin/Settings/email` page displays 2 identical warning alerts: `The current tenant will be reloaded when the settings are saved.` ![image](https://github.com/OrchardCMS/OrchardCore/assets/703248/9bb991d8-938f-429b-a0f3-6716c0a24db3)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Remove duplicate alert in settings Fixes #14286
